::Battera::

She saw Soundwave standing there near her.  "Vulois, Please tell us 
what happened? I was afraid you were dead, killed. How did you manage 
to escape?" 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> ::Soundwave walks to Vulois' position and hears what Battera said::
> Soundwave:  I to am sorry.  I had been trying to contact you for so 
long I 
> thought you had died.  I would like to return to your service.
